item.title: code
item.description: fido Bayesian multinomial logistic normal models, really fast. Lots of models including linear and non-linear regression, time-series analysis, and joint modeling of multi-omic data. renamed from stray. GitHub RcppHungarian Header library and R functions to solve minimum cost bipartite matching problem using Huhn-Munkres algorithm. CRAN RcppCoDA Blazing fast library for the analysis of compositional data with both C++ and R interfaces GitHub philr Phylogenetic partitioning based ILR transform for metagenomics data.

item.title: open positions
item.description: We are currently hiring graduate students. Contact Justin Silverman if you are interested.

item.title: publications
item.description: Using influenza surveillance networks to estimate state-specific prevalence of SARS-CoV-2 in the United States. Science Translational Medicine Short-Chain Fatty Acid Production by Gut Micro- biota from Children with Obesity Differs According to Prebiotic Choice and Bacterial Community Composition. mBio Inter-individual variation in dietary carbohydrate metabolism by gut bacteria revealed with droplet microfluidic culture. mSystems. Allogenic fecal microbiota transplantation in patients with non-alcoholic fatty liver disease improves abnormal small intestinal permeability: a randomized control trial.

item.title: research
item.description: We conduct cutting-edge research developing Bayesian statistical and machine learning methods for the analysis of various types of data including genomic, electronic health, and public health data. Our lab is founded on collaborations with both accademia and industry, so please contact us.
